winners and runners-up of the 8th ESEA Awards
 
Dubai Trade records impressive growth in first half of 2015
 
In line with the rapid growth of Dubai's economy, recent statistics released by Dubai Trade show promising growth figures in the first half of 2015, as compared to the same period last year.
 
HE Sultan rings bell to celebrate listing of 500 million dollar bond by DPW on NASDAQ
 
 
Dubai Customs unveils advisory panel for smart services
 
The purpose of the panel is advancing innovation in smart service delivery in line with DC Smart Transformation Strategy and Dubai's future aspirations.
 
2. Jebel Ali Free Zone inaugurates its new integrated Service Center in Jafza South
 
 
Steel, Metal and Building Material trade in Jafza up 14%
 
Steel, Metal and Building Material companies based in Jafza generated trade worth AED 12.26 billion in 2010 registering a growth of 14% last year in comparison to AED 10.75 billion in 2009.
